TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ManifestReader extends System.Object
public ref class ManifestReader abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Reads an XML manifest file into an object representation.
Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest ReadManifest (System.IO.Stream input, bool preserveStream);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest ReadManifest(class System.IO.Stream input, bool preserveStream) cil managed
Public Shared Function ReadManifest (input As Stream, preserveStream As Boolean) As Manifest
public: static Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::Manifest ^ ReadManifest(System::IO::Stream ^ input, bool preserveStream);
static member ReadManifest : System.IO.Stream * bool -> Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the InputStream property of the resulting manifest object. Used by ManifestWriter to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
Docs.summary: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
Docs.returns: A base object representation of the manifest. Can be cast to AssemblyManifest, ApplicationManifest, or DeployManifest to access more specific functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest ReadManifest (string path, bool preserveStream);

static member ReadManifest : string * bool -> Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest

Docs.param: The name of the input file.

Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the InputStream property of the resulting manifest object. Used by ManifestWriter to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation. This option is not honored if the specified input file is an embedded manfiest in a PE.
Docs.summary: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
Docs.returns: A base object representation of the manifest. Can be cast to AssemblyManifest, ApplicationManifest, or DeployManifest to access more specific functionality.

Docs.param: Specifies the expected type of the manifest. Valid values are "AssemblyManifest", "ApplicationManifest", or "DepoyManifest".

Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the InputStream property of the resulting manifest object. Used by ManifestWriter to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
